=== Water polo === === Baseball === Baseball is unlike
most other competitive sports in that the defense is given control of the ball .

Baseball is unlike most other competitive sports in that the defense is given control
of the ball . Additionally , the number of players on the field at any given time is lopsided in favor of the defense which always has nine players on the field ; the offense has between one and four . Historically , each player on the team had a role both on offense and defense .

There are three basic ways in which an out can occur : 1 . ) If three strikes
are recorded against the batter , 2 . ) if a ball hit by a batter is caught by a defensive player before it hits the ground , or 3 . ) if a runner who is between bases or has not reached a base to which he is forced is put out by a defensive player in possession of the ball . If the batter manages to hit the ball , all nine defensive players become active and use the ball in attempting to prevent the batter from reaching base and runners already on base from advancing or scoring . while the offense is busy attempting to move runners around the baseball diamond toward home plate , the defense uses the ball in various ways to achieve outs .
